name: postgress_client
description: The docker image for running the postgres client.

scripts.start:it: cross-var docker run -it alexgreff/postgres_client /bin/bash -c "export PG_HOST=$SHABAM_PG_HOST PG_DATABASE=$SHABAM_PG_DATABASE PG_PORT=$SHABAM_PG_PORT PG_USER=$SHABAM_PG_USER PG_PASSWORD=$SHABAM_PG_PASSWORD; bash"

author: Alexander Greff
